hero.title: Composting with technology and safety every stage.
hero.subtitle: Discover our logistics system, GORE® Cover closed treatment, and fertilizer production.

about.title: About Us
paragraphs: We are a company with over 12 years of history, pioneers and specialists in mechanized collection, in the treatment of organic waste through composting, and in the production of high-quality Organic Compound Fertilizer, registered with the Ministry of Agriculture.
We serve various sectors, offering proper disposal in accordance with the National Solid Waste Policy (Law No. 12.305/2010), avoiding environmental liabilities and shared responsibility.
We represent UTV AG in South America, a German company with GORE® COVER technology: full process control, high efficiency, and low operating cost.

highlights.title: Pioneering
highlights.text: 12 years of experience in mechanized collection and organic waste treatment

highlights.title: Legal Compliance
highlights.text: We comply with all guidelines of the National Solid Waste Policy

highlights.title: GORE ® Cover Technology
highlights.text: We develop projects for waste treatment companies in Latin America in partnership with the German company UTV AG.

services.title: Provided Services
services.description: We operate throughout the composting chain: from collection to fertilizer production, with technology and specialized consulting.

list.title: Collection / Logistics
list.text: Effective solutions for the mechanized collection of organic waste. We use licensed trucks and provide resistant, practical containers for proper temporary storage.

list.title: Composting Treatment
list.text: Closed-system composting with German GORE® COVER technology, ensuring efficiency, full monitoring, and up to 97% reduction in odors and vectors.

list.title: Fertilizer Production
list.text: Result of composting: organic fertilizer certified by the Ministry of Agriculture, widely used for vegetables, fruit trees, degraded areas, and landscaping.

list.title: GORE® COVER TECHNOLOGY AND CONSULTING
list.text: Development of logistics projects and provision of GORE® COVER technology for managing and treating the organic fraction of MSW in partnership with UTV AG.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: Companies and institutions that trust Composul to turn waste into sustainable solutions.
